item.title: Ukraine calls for Olympics ban on Russia and Belarus
item.description: "How can we stand next to our murderers on a podium?" Ukraine is on a mission to get Russian and Belarusian athletes banned from the 2024 Paris Olympics.

item.title: Meta announces paid verification
item.description: Meta has announced you will soon be able to buy verification for both Facebook and Instagram. Unlike Twitter, they will require government ID to improve their security and authenticity though it will also be more expensive.
item.keywords: DWVC,DWdigital, Meta, Facebook, Instagram, technology, Social Media, Verification

media:content.media:title: Meta announces paid verification
media:content.media:keywords: DWVC,DWdigital, Meta, Facebook, Instagram, technology, Social Media, Verification

item.title: How NATO polices the skies on Russia's border
item.description: NATO polices the skies on Russia's border from the Amari airbase in Estonia. The mission is to protect the air space and identify unknown and potentially hostile aircraft.
item.keywords: DWVC,NATO, Russia, war, Urkaine, jets, pilots, air policing

item.title: Earthquake survivors search mass graves for loved ones
item.description: Earthquake survivors are coming to these mass graves in Turkey in search of their loved ones. Workers and volunteers carry out a burial ritual on site when relatives are not present to do it themselves.
item.keywords: DWVC,Earthquake, Turkey, mass graves, burial, survivors
